com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.uniblock.casstore.mapdb

Class MapDBFSCASStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.uniblock.BasicDataDescriptorFactory
      • com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.uniblock.casstore.AbstractCASStore
        • com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.uniblock.casstore.AbstractFSCASStore
          • com.igeekinc.indelible.indeliblefs.uniblock.casstore.mapdb.MapDBFSCASStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CASStore

    public class MapDBFSCASStore
extends AbstractFSCASStore
implements CASStore
    The DBFSCASStore implements a segment store within a single directory with a single database connection. In the storeRoot, the StoreConfiguration.properties is store along with the root of the CAS storage tree.
